title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 428 - State Agency Activities Affecting Historic Or Cultural Properties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 428 - State Agency Activities Affecting Historic Or Cultural Properties

State Regulations
§ 428.1 - Responsibility of state agencies with regard to registered and eligible property
§ 428.2 - Coordination with other review procedures
§ 428.3 - Activities undertaken by more than one state agency
§ 428.4 - Undertakings subject to review
§ 428.5 - Request for determination of eligibility
§ 428.6 - Determination of eligibility pursuant to request
§ 428.7 - Assessment of impact
§ 428.8 - Consultation process: exploration of feasible and prudent alternatives
§ 428.9 - Consultation process: public participation
§ 428.10 - Consultation process: letter of resolution
§ 428.11 - Individual undertakings exempt from review
§ 428.12 - Designation of categories of undertakings exempt from review
§ 428.13 - Establishment of standards for series of similar undertakings
§ 428.14 - Changes different from those normally occurring
§ 428.15 - State board for historic preservation
§ 428.16 - Written record; report

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 428

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §§3.09[8], 14.09[1], [2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
